name: Elon (itch) (Rungeon)
description:
Elon reckons the end is near, so has advised you to get to rocket ship.

One button game, either  Space, Left Mouse Click or Button A on a controller to jump, you can press esc key during gameplay(not title) to get options to turn down the sound effects.

Known issues : HTML version the sound is delayed, works much better on exe so included it.

All art,sound effects and code was all done over the gamejam by myself, apart from Music is Stranger Things by music unlimited (royality free) and Pencil Sharp Font from FreeFonts.
